categories: Category:Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi

nodes.text: Dawn of the Jedi: The Prisoner of Bogan 1

Dawn of the Jedi: The Prisoner of Bogan 1 is the first issue in the Prisoner of Bogan story arc of the Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi comic book series and the sixth issue of the series in total. It is set in the earliest days of the Jedi Order, in a time before the polarization of the light and dark sides of the Force. This issue was released on November 28 2012.
An excerpt of this issue is included in the novel Dawn of the Jedi: Into the Void.

Banished to the dark moon Bogan, the Force Hound Xesh has been living in contemplation; the memory of who he was before his ship crashed on Tython still escapes him. A rival from his past is on his trail, and the Je'daii are doing all they can to discover his origin. And now, Xesh is about to meet someone who will change his life forever, a former great Je'daii . . . the prisoner of Bogan!
